name: Pokémon Shuffle
overview: Pokemon Shuffle is a Pokemon game available now for the Nintendo 3DS family of systems. In Pokemon Shuffle, your goal is to clear various stages by lining up the same Pokemon and clearing these matches from the puzzle area. Within each puzzle stage, you can deal damage to the wild Pokemon you face by lining up three of the same Pokemon to clear them. Battle and try to catch the Pokemon before you run out of moves!
